articles.title: Dettori stars again to complete Royal Ascot set - Racenet
articles.description: Frankie Dettori enjoyed another day to remember at Royal Ascot, as he equalled Pat Eddery's record of 73 winners on the final day of the meeting.
articles.content:
Frankie Dettori enjoyed another day to remember at Royal Ascot, as he equalled Pat Eddery's record of 73 winners on the final day of the meeting.
